current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend title 38, United States Code, to modify the method of determining
whether Filipino veterans are United States residents for purposes of
eligibility for receipt of the full-dollar rate of compensation under the
laws administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

short-title.#text: Benefits Fairness for Filipino Veterans Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , is amended by adding at the end the following new sentence:

may not determine that a person is not an individual residing in the United States for purposes of this subsection solely because the person is outside the United States for any period of time less than one year.

header.#text: Determination of eligibility of certain Filipino veterans for full-dollar rate of benefits under the laws administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S1559 IS: Benefits Fairness for Filipino Veterans Act of 2013
